subcategory: Monitoring, Data Collection and Submission to the Agency
description:
(i) The Licence Holder shall keep a record of the data specified in condition <<condition no.>> for inspection by the Agency’s officers at all reasonable times.

(ii) The record shall show the date and time that each measurement has been taken, reference to the specific borehole that the data has been collected from, the datum from which the groundwater level has been measured and whether the boreholes are being pumped or are at rest.

(iii) The Licence Holder shall record the pumping rate from each borehole at the time each measurement is being taken and the period over which the boreholes have been pumped and keep such records available for inspection by the Agency’s officers at all reasonable times.
